item.title: £100 contactless card limit to be lifted
item.description: Consumers will be able to set their own contactless limits from March 2026, under new rules from the Financial Conduct Authority

item.description: Interest rates, inflation, unemployment, and bank closures all made headlines this week. How closely were you following the news?
